AddMembersToGroup.description: Grants permission to add a list of members (users or groups) to a group

AssociateDelegateToResource.description: Grants permission to add a member (user or group) to the resource's set of delegates

AssociateMemberToGroup.description: Grants permission to add a member (user or group) to the group's set

AssumeImpersonationRole.description: Grants permission to assume an impersonation role for the given Amazon WorkMail organization

CancelMailboxExportJob.description: Grants permission to cancel a currently running mailbox export job

CreateAlias.description: Grants permission to add an alias to the set of a given member (user or group) of WorkMail

CreateAvailabilityConfiguration.description: Grants permission to create an AvailabilityConfiguration for the given Amazon WorkMail organization and domain

CreateGroup.description: Grants permission to create a group that can be used in WorkMail by calling the RegisterToWorkMail operation

CreateImpersonationRole.description: Grants permission to create an impersonation role for the given Amazon WorkMail organization

CreateInboundMailFlowRule.description: Grants permission to create an inbound email flow rule which will apply to all email sent to an organization

CreateMailDomain.description: Grants permission to create a mail domain

CreateMailUser.description: Grants permission to create a user in the directory

CreateMobileDeviceAccessRule.description: Grants permission to create a new mobile device access rule

CreateOrganization.description: Grants permission to create a new Amazon WorkMail organization

CreateOutboundMailFlowRule.description: Grants permission to create an outbound email flow rule which will apply to all email sent from an organization

CreateResource.description: Grants permission to create a new WorkMail resource

CreateSmtpGateway.description: Grants permission to register an SMTP gateway to a WorkMail organization

CreateUser.description: Grants permission to create a user, which can be enabled afterwards by calling the RegisterToWorkMail operation

DeleteAccessControlRule.description: Grants permission to delete an access control rule

DeleteAlias.description: Grants permission to remove one or more specified aliases from a set of aliases for a given user

DeleteAvailabilityConfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete the AvailabilityConfiguration for the given Amazon WorkMail organization and domain

DeleteEmailMonitoringConfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete the email monitoring configuration for an organization

DeleteGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a group from WorkMail

DeleteImpersonationRole.description: Grants permission to delete an impersonation role for the given Amazon WorkMail organization

DeleteInboundMailFlowRule.description: Grants permission to remove an inbound email flow rule to no longer apply to emails sent to an organization

DeleteMailDomain.description: Grants permission to remove an unused mail domain from an organization

DeleteMailboxPermissions.description: Grants permission to delete permissions granted to a member (user or group)

DeleteMobileDevice.description: Grants permission to remove a mobile device from a user

DeleteMobileDeviceAccessOverride.description: Grants permission to delete a mobile device access override

DeleteMobileDeviceAccessRule.description: Grants permission to delete a mobile device access rule

DeleteOrganization.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon WorkMail organization and all underlying AWS resources managed by Amazon WorkMail as part of the organization

DeleteOutboundMailFlowRule.description: Grants permission to remove an outbound email flow rule so that it no longer applies to emails sent from an organization

DeleteResource.description: Grants permission to delete the specified resource

DeleteRetentionPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the retention policy based on the supplied organization and policy identifiers

DeleteSmtpGateway.description: Grants permission to remove an SMTP gateway from an organization

DeleteUser.description: Grants permission to delete a user from WorkMail and all subsequent systems

DeregisterFromWorkMail.description: Grants permission to mark a user, group, or resource as no longer used in WorkMail

DeregisterMailDomain.description: Grants permission to deregister a mail domain from an organization

DescribeDirectories.description: Grants permission to show a list of directories available for use in creating an organization

DescribeEmailMonitoringConfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve the email monitoring configuration for an organization

DescribeGroup.description: Grants permission to read the details for a group

DescribeInboundDmarcSettings.description: Grants permission to read the settings in a DMARC policy for a specified organization

DescribeInboundMailFlowRule.description: Grants permission to read the details of an inbound mail flow rule configured for an organization

DescribeKmsKeys.description: Grants permission to show a list of KMS Keys available for use in creating an organization

DescribeMailDomains.description: Grants permission to show the details of all mail domains associated with the organization

DescribeMailGroups.description: Grants permission to show the details of all groups associated with the organization

DescribeMailUsers.description: Grants permission to show the details of all users associated with the organization

DescribeMailboxExportJob.description: Grants permission to retrieve details of a mailbox export job

DescribeOrganization.description: Grants permission to read details of an organization

DescribeOrganizations.description: Grants permission to show a summary of all organizations associated with the account

DescribeOutboundMailFlowRule.description: Grants permission to read the details of an outbound mail flow rule configured for an organization

DescribeResource.description: Grants permission to read the details for a resource

DescribeSmtpGateway.description: Grants permission to read the details of an SMTP gateway registered to an organization

DescribeUser.description: Grants permission to read details for a user

DisableMailGroups.description: Grants permission to disable a mail group when it is not being used, in order to allow it to be deleted

DisableMailUsers.description: Grants permission to disable a user mailbox when it is no longer being used, in order to allow it to be deleted

DisassociateDelegateFromResource.description: Grants permission to remove a member from the resource's set of delegates

DisassociateMemberFromGroup.description: Grants permission to remove a member from a group

EnableMailDomain.description: Grants permission to enable a mail domain in the organization

EnableMailGroups.description: Grants permission to enable a mail group after it has been created to allow it to receive mail

EnableMailUsers.description: Grants permission to enable a user's mailbox after it has been created to allow it to receive mail

GetAccessControlEffect.description: Grants permission to get the effects of access control rules as they apply to a specified IPv4 address, access protocol action, or user ID

GetDefaultRetentionPolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the retention policy associated at an organizational level

GetImpersonationRole.description: Grants permission to retrieve an impersonation role for the given Amazon WorkMail organization

GetImpersonationRoleEffect.description: Grants permission to get the effect of the rules associated to an impersonation role for a specific user

GetJournalingRules.description: Grants permission to read the configured journaling and fallback email addresses for email journaling

GetMailDomain.description: Grants permission to retrieve details of a given mail domain in an organization

GetMailDomainDetails.description: Grants permission to get the details of the mail domain

GetMailGroupDetails.description: Grants permission to get the details of the mail group

GetMailUserDetails.description: Grants permission to get the details of the user's mailbox and account

GetMailboxDetails.description: Grants permission to read the details of the user's mailbox

GetMobileDeviceAccessEffect.description: Grants permission to simulate the effect of the mobile device access rules for the given attributes of a sample access event

GetMobileDeviceAccessOverride.description: Grants permission to retrieve a mobile device access override

GetMobileDeviceDetails.description: Grants permission to get the details of the mobile device

GetMobileDevicesForUser.description: Grants permission to get a list of the mobile devices associated with the user

GetMobilePolicyDetails.description: Grants permission to get the details of the mobile device policy associated with the organization

ListAccessControlRules.description: Grants permission to list the access control rules

ListAliases.description: Grants permission to list the aliases associated with a given entity

ListAvailabilityConfigurations.description: Grants permission to list all the AvailabilityConfiguration's for the given Amazon WorkMail organization

ListGroupMembers.description: Grants permission to read an overview of the members of a group. Users and groups can be members of a group

ListGroups.description: Grants permission to list summaries of the organization's groups

ListImpersonationRoles.description: Grants permission to list the impersonation roles for the given Amazon WorkMail organization

ListInboundMailFlowRules.description: Grants permission to list inbound mail flow rules configured for an organization

ListMailDomains.description: Grants permission to list the mail domains for a given organization

ListMailboxExportJobs.description: Grants permission to list mailbox export jobs

ListMailboxPermissions.description: Grants permission to list the mailbox permissions associated with a user, group, or resource mailbox

ListMembersInMailGroup.description: Grants permission to get a list of all the members in a mail group

ListMobileDeviceAccessOverrides.description: Grants permission to list the mobile device access overrides

ListMobileDeviceAccessRules.description: Grants permission to list the mobile device access rules

ListOrganizations.description: Grants permission to list the non-deleted organizations

ListOutboundMailFlowRules.description: Grants permission to list outbound mail flow rules configured for an organization

ListResourceDelegates.description: Grants permission to list the delegates associated with a resource

ListResources.description: Grants permission to list the organization's resources

ListSmtpGateways.description: Grants permission to list SMTP gateways registered to the organization

ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the tags applied to an Amazon WorkMail organization resource

ListUsers.description: Grants permission to list the organization's users

PutAccessControlRule.description: Grants permission to add a new access control rule

PutEmailMonitoringConfiguration.description: Grants permission to add or update the email monitoring configuration for an organization

PutInboundDmarcSettings.description: Grants permission to enable or disable a DMARC policy for a given organization

PutMailboxPermissions.description: Grants permission to set permissions for a user, group, or resource, replacing any existing permissions

PutMobileDeviceAccessOverride.description: Grants permission to add or update a mobile device access override

PutRetentionPolicy.description: Grants permission to add or update the retention policy

RegisterMailDomain.description: Grants permission to register a new mail domain in an organization

RegisterToWorkMail.description: Grants permission to register an existing and disabled user, group, or resource for use by associating a mailbox and calendaring capabilities

RemoveMembersFromGroup.description: Grants permission to remove members from a mail group

ResetPassword.description: Grants permission to allow the administrator to reset the password for a user

ResetUserPassword.description: Grants permission to reset the password for a user's account

SearchMembers.description: Grants permission to perform a prefix search to find a specific user in a mail group

SetAdmin.description: Grants permission to mark a user as being an administrator

SetDefaultMailDomain.description: Grants permission to set the default mail domain for the organization

SetJournalingRules.description: Grants permission to set journaling and fallback email addresses for email journaling

SetMailGroupDetails.description: Grants permission to set the details of the mail group which has just been created

SetMailUserDetails.description: Grants permission to set the details for the user account which has just been created

SetMobilePolicyDetails.description: Grants permission to set the details of a mobile policy associated with the organization

StartMailboxExportJob.description: Grants permission to start a new mailbox export job

TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag the specified Amazon WorkMail organization resource

TestAvailabilityConfiguration.description: Grants permission to performs a test on an availability provider to ensure that access is allowed

TestInboundMailFlowRules.description: Grants permission to test what inbound rules will apply to an email with a given sender and recipient

TestOutboundMailFlowRules.description: Grants permission to test what outbound rules will apply to an email with a given sender and recipient

UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag the specified Amazon WorkMail organization resource

UpdateAvailabilityConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update an existing AvailabilityConfiguration for the given Amazon WorkMail organization and domain

UpdateDefaultMailDomain.description: Grants permission to update which domain is the default domain for an organization

UpdateImpersonationRole.description: Grants permission to update an existing impersonation role for the given Amazon WorkMail organization

UpdateInboundMailFlowRule.description: Grants permission to update the details of an inbound email flow rule which will apply to all email sent to an organization

UpdateMailboxQuota.description: Grants permission to update the maximum size (in MB) of the user's mailbox

UpdateMobileDeviceAccessRule.description: Grants permission to update a mobile device access rule

UpdateOutboundMailFlowRule.description: Grants permission to update the details of an outbound email flow rule which will apply to all email sent from an organization

UpdatePrimaryEmailAddress.description: Grants permission to update the primary email for a user, group, or resource

UpdateResource.description: Grants permission to update details for the resource

UpdateSmtpGateway.description: Grants permission to update the details of an existing SMTP gateway registered to an organization

WipeMobileDevice.description: Grants permission to remotely wipe the mobile device associated with a user's account

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tag key-value pairs that are passed in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tag key-value pairs attached to the resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by the tag keys that are passed in the request
